org.oddjob.beanbus

Interface BusDriver<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Outbound<T>, Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptParser

    public interface BusDriver<T>
extends Runnable, Outbound<T>
    Marker interface for things that can be part of a bean bus and drive beans down the bus.

    It is not required to implement this interface to be a driver on a bean bus.

    Author:
    rob
